pages.text: First you need to make a crude axe to get some wood. Sure, you can punch the trees with your fists, but that would not be very civilized now would it? $(br) You can find and rocks lying around on the ground. Sticks can be acquired by furiously attacking tree leaves. For the fibres, punch grass and hope for the best.
After getting the axe, you can get wood more easily. Then you can start thinking about making a pick for mining stone from the ground.
